Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 5.63 x 1.02 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ZJ', 'Department': 'womens', 'Manufacturer': 'QTMY'}
Review Text: The Qtmy crystal gemstone head band was so sophisticated and sparkly looking. I received the pink one. It fit perfectly. The head band itself is lightweight and comfortable. The value for your money is worth it because it can bring your outfit up from casual to formal.

Love that the bjorn hall band came in black. It’s versatile to match my work uniforms . Made of very high quality material. The only thing I wasn’t crazy about was my buttons not seeming symmetrical. Other than that this head band will last a very long time.5 stars for me.

ambari
{'Product Dimensions': '4.53 x 4.53 x 2.36 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '645312483587'}
This crown was elegant in its own right. The crown itself wasn’t that thick. But in the jewel part of the crown it has thickness. Warmth from the crown was low. I feel like the quality of this crown is awesome. The color is nice and dark. I live the mysterious look of the crown. The price point was good. I recommend this.
Ambari black crown

{'Brand': 'JulyQueen', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 2 x 1 inches; 2.56 Ounces'}
The bomb crotchet twist came with 6 packages of hair . Each pack had the right amount of thickness. The ombré color was perfect , and vibrant . The ends of the hair the color was very visible.. the color I had was the burgundy ombré hair. It is enough packs to install a whol head.  Another bang for your buck item.
Ombré bomb twist crotchet hair

I loved the length of this hair. The ombré color was perfect . It came with six packs which was enough for my whole head. The hair was pretty good. My only dislike is that the styles only last for two weeks because the hair unravels. The price point is pretty good for six packs of hair.
Ombré burgundy pre looped hair

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Profession**: Likely in the medical field, indicated by the use of a nurse headband.
- **Color Preference**: Favors versatile colors that complement work uniforms, with a particular attraction to vibrant shades like burgundy and pink. Recently demonstrated a strong interest in stylish hair accessories, especially those that add a sophisticated touch and can elevate outfits from casual to formal.
- **Material Quality**: Highly values high-quality, natural materials; appreciates smooth, durable textures. Shows preference for lightweight accessories that ensure comfort throughout long working hours.
- **Functionality**: Emphasizes practical features in accessories, favoring easy-to-use items that integrate seamlessly into daily routines while providing styling options.
- **Attention to Detail**: Notices design elements such as color vibrancy and sophistication, favoring well-finished products that are both visually striking and functional.
- **Fashion Versatility**: Seeking items that transition effortlessly from casual to dressy, showing a heightened appreciation for unique and elegant accessories that enhance professional and formal attire.
- **Overall Satisfaction**: Generally a positive reviewer, often giving high ratings based on quality, usability, and aesthetic appeal, finds value in accessories that elevate her overall look.
- **New Insights**: Showcased an appreciation for sophisticated and sparkly accessories, valuing those that enhance outfits with a stylish flair while ensuring functionality and comfort. Enjoys styling tools that offer heat-free options, combining practicality with aesthetic benefits.
